data.message: I love u #Eminem i please u and all the greek stans here please come to greece homie we are having a big war before i die i wanna see u homie please dont regret my dream of my heart and spirit soul as yo biggest fan always by me penny please see this comment of mine and feel my heartbeat i am so real that i want to see u for real ill prove it to you and all the greek stans if you come to greece for us here we will come and ull see us and feel our crowd as like ull never imagine and ull never forget cuz we love u and your music and youll live this crowd like other concerts youve have done in back time ,look maybe i know the problem is the money but think with your heart and spirit fuck the money do it for your love against us your greek stans money cant reach us there love always brings us together right?
